title: Delivering Value
description: Are we delivering value to our customers and stakeholders?
example_green: We consistently receive positive feedback and metrics show high customer satisfaction.
example_amber: We deliver value, but feedback is mixed or metrics are inconsistent.
example_red: We are struggling to deliver value; feedback is poor and metrics are low.

title: Easy to Release
description: Is it easy to release changes to production?
example_green: Releases are automated, quick, and painless.
example_amber: Releases are manageable but involve manual steps or occasional issues.
example_red: Releases are difficult, time-consuming, and often cause problems.

title: Fun
description: Are we having fun working together?
example_green: The team enjoys working together and the atmosphere is positive.
example_amber: Work is okay, but the team isn’t particularly energized or having fun.
example_red: Team morale is low, and work feels like a chore.

title: Health of Codebase
description: Is the codebase healthy and easy to work with?
example_green: The code is clean, well-tested, and easy to understand and modify.
example_amber: The codebase has some technical debt but is generally manageable.
example_red: The codebase is messy, complex, and difficult to work with.

title: Learning
description: Are we continuously learning and improving?
example_green: We actively share knowledge, learn new skills, and improve our ways of working.
example_amber: We learn occasionally, but it’s not a consistent focus.
example_red: We are stuck in old habits and rarely learn or try new things.

title: Speed
description: Are we able to deliver changes quickly?
example_green: We can quickly deliver features and fixes from idea to production.
example_amber: Delivery speed is acceptable but could be faster.
example_red: Delivery is slow and hampered by bottlenecks.

title: Teamwork
description: Do we collaborate effectively as a team?
example_green: We collaborate seamlessly, support each other, and resolve conflicts constructively.
example_amber: Collaboration is okay, but there are occasional silos or communication issues.
example_red: Teamwork is poor, with conflicts, lack of trust, or poor communication.

title: Mission
description: Do we have a clear mission and goals?
example_green: We have a clear, shared understanding of our mission and how our work contributes to it.
example_amber: The mission is somewhat clear, but there's some ambiguity or disagreement.
example_red: We lack a clear mission or understanding of how our work fits into the bigger picture.

title: Empowerment
description: Does the team feel empowered to make decisions?
example_green: We feel empowered to make decisions about our work and how we do it.
example_amber: We have some autonomy, but often need approval for decisions we could make ourselves.
example_red: We feel disempowered and decisions are mostly made outside the team.

title: Suitable Process
description: Do our processes support our work effectively?
example_green: Our processes are efficient, effective, and help us deliver value smoothly.
example_amber: Our processes work, but have some inefficiencies or areas for improvement.
example_red: Our processes are cumbersome, bureaucratic, or hinder our ability to work effectively.

title: Support
description: Do we feel supported by the organization and colleagues?
example_green: We feel well-supported by management, stakeholders, and other teams when needed.
example_amber: Support is available but sometimes hard to get or inconsistent.
example_red: We feel unsupported, blocked, or lack the resources/help needed to succeed.
